title: Welcome to the Pantheon app!
body: We're currently doing all the super duper important stuff like planning events and making food arrangments for you guys. We'll send you a notification when we're done. So stick around!

title: Keep looking here for notifications!
body: If we were to send you any notifications, you'll see them here. :)

title: Share this app with your friends!
body: We would really appreciate it if you took the time to share this app with your friends.

title: Let us know if you have any more doubts!
body: If you have any queries regarding our event or the activities, feel free to reach out to us at hi@bapspatil.com.
